Frequently Asked Questions
What works does SuperHomes take up?
SuperHomes takes up all kinds of construction, renovation and interior projects. SuperHomes also provides architectural design consulting and project management services.
Why should anybody choose SuperHomes?
The SuperHomes brand and our team of qualified professionals stand for very high standards of work quality. The idea behind SuperHomes is to resolve all issues faced by anyone looking to build their own Homes. SuperHomes will manage everything from initial design and planning to handover. We will ensure timely delivery by adhering to strict schedules. There is extensive warranty post completion as well. We treat every home project like it is our own. Head over to the Why Choose Us page for more details.
How do you guarantee hassle-free work?
The work is hassle-free because we maintain complete transparency at every level, starting from the costing given, project timelines, procuring of material/s, payments to execution. The same will be updated to the clients on a regular basis.
How do we start building our home?
SuperHomes can assist our clients in the approval process by providing a reliable Liaison agent to handle the approval process. We are not directly involved in the approval process but our partners ensure that the clients get a completely hassle-free experience at a reasonable cost.
How do you ensure quality of works at site?
We stringently follow QuaSet – our quality control checklist with 200+ practical quality checks. You can refer to the quality section of the website for more details about QuaSet. (Link to QC page)
Is compound wall included in the package?
Not all houses require a compound wall to be constructed. There might be some houses which require a compound wall on just two or three sides. By removing the compound wall from the package, we ensure that only the clients who opt for a compound wall, pay for it.
What happens if I want different brand of materials other than the one's in the packages?
We provide complete flexibility in terms of material and brand specification. Any change made in material specification or brand will also be reflected in the total cost accordingly.
How long does it take to complete construction?
Duration of construction varies depending upon the built-up area, location, design complexity etc. We will give you a detailed project schedule with timelines before starting the project.
Does SuperHomes provide loans for construction?
SuperHomes assists the clients with the documentation part for the loan approval process.
Does SuperHomes include the interior works with the construction packages?
There are separate packages for interior works if you wish to get the interiors done through SuperHomes. You can also fully customize an interior package based on your requirements. Check out our interior packages.
What if the prices of the materials increase when the project is ongoing. Would there be a price escalation?
The pricing of our contracts is frozen on a stamp paper. Hence, the prices remain stable in most of the scenarios. Only in exceptional situations where there is a sudden spike in prices due to external circumstances, the price variation is to be paid by the client. On the other hand, if there is a price drop, clients get a price reduction for the same.
How can I track progress of project?
Once you sign up with us, we will provide you with a detailed project schedule with timelines mentioned for each activity undertaken at site. You can track our progress using this schedule.
Where can I find all the paperwork related to my project?
All documents, approved drawings, schedules, invoices, payment notices, reports and other paperwork related to your project can be accessed anytime from a single digital location. The access for which will be given to you as soon as you sign up with SuperHomes.
How will you keep me updated of progress at site?
The project manager assigned to you will provide you with periodic updates regarding site progress. You will also receive daily updates from the site supervisor.
Do you provide warranties?
Yes, we provide warranties for the work we do. A detailed warranty clause will be a part of the agreement.
How do you commit on-time completion of project?
Once the drawings and costings are finalized and approved by you, we issue a detailed project schedule spanning the entire project with timelines mentioned for every activity from start to finish. Our engineers follow this timetable and ensure monthly schedules are adhered to. This helps track activity and help us adapt to the necessary speed required to complete the project on time. The same schedule can also be cross verified and monitored by clients.
How comfortable is your payment process?
Our payments method is very flexible. Irrespective of the payment system you choose, we take payments only for actual work completed. The detailed payment schedule for your project will be given only after discussing which system you are comfortable with.
Can SuperHomes help in getting electrical connection for constructions?
SuperHomes may assist you in obtaining required temporary electrical and water connections for provision of services at a cost.
How are the labourers and their stay managed?
Labourers and their stay (If required) are organized by SuperHomes. As per requirement, labour sheds are set up on the site or at the nearest available site.
Who will select materials and how will it get delivered at site?
The structural materials we use are from reputed brands and will be used once approved by clients. All the finishing materials will be finalized in presence of the client and our architect. Once finalized, delivery of the materials will be coordinated by our projects team.
Does the customer have to follow up the site regularly?
The client is more than welcome to visit the site regularly but it is not a necessity. The client can enjoy a hassle-free process and visit the site only when required for plan approvals. Regular updates regarding progress of work will be given either by sharing images from site or through periodic updates from the project manager.
What is the excavation depth for foundation?
The fixed depth as per the packages is 5-6 feet, however the same is decided only after a thorough soil test.
Is Structural Design shared with the customer?
Yes, the client has access to the all the designs, drawings and reports concerning his/her project.
Do you provide Water Sump/Septic tank/Overhead tank/Rainwater harvesting?
Yes, we do provide water sump/septic tank/OHT/RWH if the client requires. The costing and specification for the same is decided based on the needs of the client and site condition.
Why do we need interior designers?
Hiring an interior designer in India, has so far been a luxury, owing to the cost involved. But times are changing, an expert who can help you design the home of your dreams is easily accessible at a much more affordable cost. An experienced designer can help you design a space that’s uniquely yours. They are the experts who can design spaces that are beautiful and more importantly, functional. Their vast knowledge of materials and vendors can drastically reduce costs. They help you save tons of time that would otherwise be spent on researching ideas. Sticking to budgets will be difficult without these professionals guiding you and if you choose to go with an end-to-end service provider like SuperHomes, the execution and quality control part is also taken care of seamlessly. All you have to do is sit back and relax.
How much do interior designers charge just for designing?
How much the designer charges depends on a variety of factors - scope of work, whether it is only basic design or it includes 3D views, selection of furnishing, furniture, décor and other services provided such as iterations, site visits, supervision etc. Always go with a designer who will guarantee supervision. The method of charging also varies with different designers, some charge lumpsum while some others charge a Sq.ft rate. SuperHomes provides a hassle-free experience by taking care of all the mentioned services from full design, supervision, execution and quality control.
Do I need to pay anything for initial discussion with you?
No, we do not charge anything for the initial consultation. We will understand your exact requirements and also give you complete clarity on the entire process.
What is the approximate cost of interior works for a 2BHK / 3 BHK?
The total cost completely depends on the scope of work and the materials selected. Full interiors for a 2BHK can start from anywhere around 3.5 Lakhs. The first step would be to decide what works are required (Link to our services) or choose from the available packages. The next step would be to select materials based on budget and design. Does the sheer variety of available designs and materials seem daunting? Our expert team at SuperHomes can help you through the entire process of designing, choosing materials and ensuring the highest quality of workmanship so that you can sit back and enjoy seeing your dream home taking shape. Get in touch now.
What kind of designs are trending these days?
There is no single design that is trending as such; each family or individual selects a design style that suits their tastes and needs. The biggest common factor that is trending now is the concept of functionality. Functional design is when every piece of furniture or furnishing in the house fulfills a purpose.Some popular design styles:
  • Traditional interior style
  • Modern interior style
  • Contemporary home decor style
  • Transitional interior design
  • Industrial interior design
  • Eclectic design style
  • Beach house style
  • Farmhouse interior design style
  • Mediterranean interior design style
  • Scandinavian interior design
  • Rustic style
  • Asian design
  • Tropical interior design style
  • Victorian
  • Minimalist
  • Vintage
Not all the above design styles are suited for an Indian household. You can choose to either stick to a single style for the entire house or choose unique styles for each room. Another option is to mix and match by choosing individual elements from your favorite styles. Our experienced designers who have knowledge about the pros and cons of each style can help you with this process. Get A free consultation.
Could you help me design a small space in a low budget?
Of course! Size is not a constraint. We can design beautiful interiors irrespective of space and budget. The cost of your interiors depends on the materials you use to furnish your home. Small homes can be designed and furnished by optimizing available space.
Create your dream home.Tell us about your project today.
